

```{r}

library(ggplot2)
library(RMySQL)
library(tidyr)
library(base)
library(plm)
```


```{r}
# Verbinden Sie sich mit der MySQL-Datenbank
con <- dbConnect(MySQL(),
                 host = "localhost",
                 user = "root",
                 password = "Hausboot69",
                 dbname = "NOVAENES")

dbconn <- dbConnect(MySQL(), host = "localhost", user = "root", password = "Hausboot69", dbname = "NOVAENES");
feed = dbSendQuery(dbconn, "Select * from vwenes_full")
vwENES <- dbFetch(feed, n = -1)
dbClearResult(feed)
nrow(vwENES)

# SchlieÃŸen Sie die Verbindung zur MySQL-Datenbank
dbDisconnect(con)
```
```{r}
ggplot(vwENES, aes(x = gradeexam_bin)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "count") +
  ggtitle("Count of observations per gradeexam bin") +
  xlab("Gradeexam bin") +
  ylab("Count of observations")

ggplot(vwENES, aes(x = gradeexam_bin)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "count", fill = "blue") +
  theme_minimal()

ggplot(vwENES, aes(x = gradeexam_bin)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "count") +
  theme(panel.grid.major = element_line(color = "gray", linetype = "dotted"))

ggplot(vwENES, aes(x = gradeexam_bin, fill = gradeexam)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "count") +
  theme(legend.position = "top")

ggplot(vwENES, aes(x = gradeexam_bin)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "count") +
  scale_x_discrete(limits = levels(vwENES$gradeexam_bin)) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))

ggplot(vwENES, aes(x = gradeexam_bin, y = ..count..)) +
  geom_line() +
  ggtitle("Gradeexam count") +
  xlab("Gradeexam") +
  ylab("count")

# Summarize data by counting the number of observations per bin
binned_data <- vwENES %>% 
  group_by(gradeexam_bin) %>% 
  summarize(count = n())

# Plot the summarized data as a line plot
ggplot(binned_data, aes(x = gradeexam_bin, y = count)) +
  geom_line()




```

```{r}
# Create a new column 'gradeexam_bin' to store the binned values
vwENES$gradeexam_bin <- cut(vwENES$gradeexam, breaks = seq(0, 20, by = 0.1))

ggplot(vwENES, aes(x = gradeexam_bin)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "count")



```
```{r}
ggplot(vwENES, aes(x = gradeexam_bin)) +
  geom_line(aes(y = ..count..), stat = "identity")

```
